msContents.p: Table of contents: a division of the 44 topics, which are further subdivided, listed in the beginning of the book. Each chapter got its own table of content, which are even more detailed. Western categories, like education, traffic, geography or history with some (Chinese) specifics like household management, games or magical calculation.

Contents: Takes the individual and his needs as its starting point and therefore composes its entries. Many themes are depicted, though in a rather general way (see f.e. the part on natural sciences).

history.p: A scan of the recorded work is available at the library of the Institute of Chinese Studies, Heidelberg University.

settingDesc.p: The Shanghai yinshuguan (Commercial Press) hired many translators, who were often studying in Europe or the USA. Some of the editors of this cyclopedia possibly did have such a background.
A cyclopedia with the same title was published in Japan in 1895, which was itself based on an American Work. Although not mentioned, the editors could have been aware of the Japanese predecessor.

The publisher Shanghai yinshuguan was founded in 1897. Shanghai yinshuguan later became a very influential press, publishing primary and secondary education textbooks, dictionaries, as well as important magazines: "Eastern Miscellany" (東方雜誌), "Education Magazine" (教育雜誌), "The Short Story Magazine" (小說月報), "Youth Magazine" (少年雜誌), "Students' Magazine" (學生雜誌).The publishing house acted without government support, its publishing strategy was market-oriented.

textDesc.constitution: A complete text, ordered into 44 categories, which are written in an essayist form. The entries are rather large, up to 108 pages for education. Every entry is separately paginated.
textDesc.derivation: According to the preface the book draws on different kinds of sources from Western and Chinese origin. No further specifications made.
textDesc.purpose: The book was intended to inform and educate the common citizen of the new Chinese nation and creates an indispensable general knowledge. Includes many practical devices and often reads more like a user manual.

particDesc.p: There were many editors, whereby Wang Yanlun functioned as the chief editor.
